content.rendered:
Our Supporters

We thank Everyone for their trust!

Cinedreams possesses the immense potential to stand as the premier “Newest Film Festival” in town. Achieving this ambitious goal hinges on the collaboration and support of an extraordinary collective of names that will play an instrumental role in transforming this event into an unparalleled success. These are not merely brands; they are champions of cinematic innovation and the diverse spectrum of interests that our Film Festival aims to celebrate.
We extend our heartfelt gratitude to each brand within our esteemed network, as their unwavering commitment to the world of film and their broad appreciation for a variety of genres are the cornerstone of our festival’s success. Together, we are crafting an immersive cinematic experience that transcends boundaries and resonates with audiences of all tastes.

Our Supporters

In the spirit of unity and creativity, we welcome our esteemed partners, knowing that their invaluable contributions will elevate Cinedreams to new heights. Here’s to a collective dream, where the magic of cinema converges with the passion and support of our incredible network of brands, creating an unforgettable tapestry of storytelling and inspiration. Thank you for being the driving force behind the realization of our vision – the best “Newest Film Festival” in town.

Sneak Peak into the Event!

Expressing gratitude, we sincerely thank you for staying tuned as we share live updates from behind the scenes throughout the progression of our event! Your participation in this celebration is truly an honor for us.

Screening

27th & 28th August 2024

Venue

PVR, Juhu

Award Ceremony

29th August 2024

Feel free to reach us

+91 77100 21865
info@cinedreamsiff.com
